thread.title: Damien and Yvonne Page
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Damien and Yvonne Page

author: Damien and Yvonne Page
title: Damien and Yvonne Page
text: We were pushed into changing suppliers. Obviously your agents/customer care have to meet difficult targets. We were assured that we would notice a significant difference in our bills and that we did. A â‚¬500 bill in the door after Christmas. We are in our home 14 years and never even had a double bill ie 4 months ever come close. We have left you. Never again
